tooltips.onlyOwnerCanPlay:
Only owner can play music (work in progress).
(Other users can still play locally but only the owner will be heard by everyone)
tooltips.onlyOwnerCanChat: Only owner can send chat messages
tooltips.allowGuests: If disabled, prevents guests from entering your room
tooltips.onlyMods: Only allow moderators to join. (Option is not visibile to non moderators)
tooltips.allowBlackMidi:
Enabling this will allow players to play black midis or play large amounts of notes without the server temporarily muting them for excessive playing.

(Room owners have a higher note quota limit)
tooltips.maxPlayers: Set the max players that can be in the room
tooltips.roomName: (Optional) Set the name of the room.
tooltips.roomPassword: (Optional) Set a password for the room.

tooltips.roomSettings: Change the settings for the room

messages.logoutPressed: Are you sure you want to log out?
